data.name: GameCaptr - Video Edit
data.detailed_description:
Game Captr Video Edit is the easiest way to edit your gaming videos: Create extraordinary videos quickly and effortlessly!

Features:

  • Direct integration - one click to edit your records
  • Import additional videos, photos and audio from your PC
  • Record audio
  • Add texts
  • Easy to use
  • Cinematic transitions and video effects
  • High-quality intro and outro animations
  • Export in mp4 or upload & share directly

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1 or 10
  • Processor: 2,0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OnBoard Graphic, 1024x768px
  • Additional Notes: 2 GB free disk space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.8 GHz | AMD Quad-Core 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8000+ | AMD Radeon 5000+
  • Additional Notes: 2 GB free disk space
